def_en: Conspiracy is the secret planning by a group of people to do something illegal.
A conspiracy is an agreement between a group of people which other people think is wrong or is likely to be harmful.

def_cn: （为了私利）保持缄默的密约
def_en: If there is a conspiracy of silence about something, people who know about it have agreed that they will not talk publicly about it, although it would probably be a good thing if people in general knew about it.
